channel.title: 3d building model renderer?
channel.description:
Hey, i recently watched a movie where someone was breaking in to somewhere with my brother and he saw them use some sort of program that got a 3d model of the building that looked like this :
[img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/4213/pic4moparoe9.gif[/img]
my brother asked me if i could get this for him but im not sure what to search so i thought i would check if any of you know what it's called, what to search, or if you have the program,
Thanks

item.title: 3d building model renderer?
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:2, topic:170075”]There are tons.
Google what you just said basically.[/quote]

Ill try again

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:3, topic:170075”]Google Sketchup?
Edit: Here’s a flash thing I found on their site that shows some more features of it: http://sketchup.google.com/products.html[/quote]
Thanks ill look into that

@Exception i know that i cant but i mean it seems to be a very advanced program, so they may not actually make it

EDIT: WOW, Thanks a lot VB7 Rocks, im downloading now…

Read full topic

item.title: 3d building model renderer?
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

You can’t actually get programs that show you a 3D model of any building you choose. That’s purely Hollywood And only the bad movies too. If you’ve ever seen the movie hackers…it’s no where NEAR real.

Read full topic

item.title: 3d building model renderer?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Google Sketchup?

Edit: Here’s a flash thing I found on their site that shows some more features of it: http://sketchup.google.com/products.html

Read full topic
